info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 10:05PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Saratoga County through 1045 PM EDT... At 1005 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edinburg, or 16 miles northeast of Gloversville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Edinburg, Day Center, West Day, Batchellerville, Fox Hill, Allentown, Tenantville, Glenwild, Fayville, Conklingville, Palmer, Lake View, Clarkville, Lynnwood and Overlook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
